thread.section_title: Novotel Beijing Peace - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Prime location
thread.title_full: Prime location - Review of Novotel Beijing Peace, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: CarLi_1911
title: Prime location
text:
The best thing about this hotel is its proximity to the train station and also walking distance to tourist attractions as well as WangFuJin area.
The rooms had not changed much though the key card did encounter some slight issues. Breakfast spread was the usual fare of Chinese with some continental.
Room service was excellent. I did enjoy your creme brulee.
